title: Water DVD Rip Hindi Movie By Vipin.avi
description:
LAST UPDATED: 23 JUNE 2009.

Water is a controversial Hindi Movie by Deepa Mehta (Earth, Fire). It deals with the Sati System. I have not seen this movie yet, but I found its rating to be high. 

Its a DVD Rip.

Enjoy.
